reviews.review: Весёлая и временами страшная игра.

After playing this game for quite some time I must share with you the knowlege I aquired so that I may or may not help you with your decision to invest your currency into gaining access and personally experience the events that occur within the product thus supporting the developers.

[u]First of all I would like to introduce you to the 2 basic categories of playable actors in this scenario.[/u]


[b]1. The Surviviors[/b]
A buch of college dropouts, failiures, vandals that got recruited by the Entity to give them a second chance in life to reform and become something better than they are now. Imagine all good job opportunities you become eligible for after experiencing the game. 

Like after this game you become literally the best surgeon in the world, you can fully recover people dying from 60 cm blades slashing through them aswell as hook injuries through the scapula in a matter of SECONDS (You can even become so good you can do it on yourself).

You also become the best mechanic in the world , you can fix a completely broken generator in 80 seconds, WITH your hands, no replacement materials or parts (Although you can use them but if you're good enough to fix without them it doesn't really matter).

You also gain some pretty sick telepathy skills, which can range from seeing people through walls to sensing them across the map. You can also pin-point the location of a functioning generators, feel the electric current entering a door mechanism and feel a fellow survivor getting penetrated on a hook [spoiler](I call this the penetration sensation).[/spoiler]

Think about it Entity might be the good guy here.


[b]2. The Killers[/b]
These guys are basically... well... killers, so I should go into how they interact with the survivors and more details on each of them.

So the Killer basically wants to catch all the bad surgeons and mewchanics, and will knock down anyone who isn't athletic enought to aviod them or spooked enough to squat in a corner for 67 minutes.

So it seems pretty simple you need to use your god tier mechanic skills to repair the generators and survive another day. But since there are so many generators the killer will eventually find them and with the strenght to cut through a survivor and carry them on their shoulder how do they get stopped?

Xylophobia.

That's right the killers have a massive case of Xylophobia and will stop in terror if you lean a wodden pallet on them, the killer can not vault over the pallet (reason being Xylophobia) but instead they can make it explode by double tapping the pallet while screaming: [i]"BEGONE THOT!".[/i]

Although fear of wood is the reason they can not vault over pallets Killers seem to have very little skill in parkour as it takes them half a math class to vault over a window or a fence.


[b]Now that you know the basics let me give you a percantage statistic for each major event that might happen based on some unknown algorythm[/b]

Powering the exit gates: 80%
Opening the exit gates: 71%
Getting all 4 survivor kills in a match 23%
Finding Very rare ultra rare item in the bloodweb: 9%
Losing the sick item you just got because you got facecamped: 85%
Survivor teabagging you while you play killer: 40%
Getting tunneled by the killer after teabagging them: 95%
Getting tunelled and facecamped because your team completed 1 gen and the killer has no other choice to win because you're "GEN RUSHING":70%
Franklins Demise: 14%
Decisive striked atleast once in a match: 25%
Dead hard: 40%
NOED: 60%
Borrowed time: 99%
Billy with Ruin and Thrill of the tunt: 60%
Pinata loving Leatherface: 76%
Freddy is OP in end game chat after dying while running in a straight line: 65%
One Hit hatched Huntress with Infantry Belt after you pop 3 Bloody Party Streamers: 89%
Wraith with NOED: 135%
Dying after "going for the hatch": 75%
DC after getting downed once: 114%
Unhook infront of killer without borrowed time: 156%
Looping for 3 minutes and realising no one is doing gens, they are all crouching in the corner because "the killer is near": 230%
Iron grasp into basement: 80%
MIchael Myers hiding in the basement with insidious: 2%
something is "OP": 33%

Um jogo execelente, gameplay divertido e tenso.

Pros: 
- Muita variedade para quem joga de assassino.
- Um sistema de "Vantagens" que incentivam estilos de jogo diferentes.
- Relativamente balanceado (Dependendo da sua habilidade no game obvio).
- Muitas vezes vai garantir bons sustos.
- É otimo para jogar com os amigos.
- Mapas e personagens com um otimo design.
- Partidas intensas e otima trilha sonora.
- Atualizações semanais.

Cons: 
- Alguns bugs que podem acabar com sua partida mesmo isso sendo muito raro.
- Comunidade absurdamente toxica e hipocrita.
- Não amigavel com iniciantes já que leva tempo para realmente aprender a jogar (Conheço gente que acha o jogo um lixo pq nunca aprendeu a jogar :v).
- Jogo P2P, não tem um servidor dedicado então pode demorar para achar partidas ou achar partidas com ping muito alto.
- Falta de otimização em alguns mapas e em geral no jogo.

Apesar dos bugs o jogo tem atualizações constantes para corrigi-los, com certeza vale os R$ 36,99.

Lo único malo que veo es que cada vez los asesinos estan mas fuertes con cada dlc que sacan. Por lo que se vuelve muy dificil sobrevivir en la partida.

В чём отличие фильмов от данной игры?

В фильмах нельзя наделить пожилого старика, прошедшего войну, возможностью бегать, как атлет, лечить самого себя, как врач, видеть убийцу на расстоянии, потому что вас его с маньяком связывают кровные узы, и быстро передвигаться на корточках. И главное, чтобы это не выглядело тупо.

В фильмах нельзя надавать люлей убийце, чтобы он ещё и обиделся.

В фильмах нельзя встретить доброго маньяка, который поможет прокачаться и живым отпустит.

В фильмах нельзя сидеть с прожжённым от диких лагов интернета стулом.

В фильмах нельзя захлёбываться смехом (кроме четвёртой части "Кошмара на улице Вязов") от происходящего на экране.

Meu avô fumou a vida inteira. Eu tinha uns 6 anos quando ouvi minha mãe dizer a ele: ''Se você quiser ver seus netos se formando, você tem que parar imediatamente''. Nunca tinha visto meu avô chorar antes, ele percebeu o quanto tinha a perder se continuasse a fumar. Ele jogou o cigarro que estava fumando no chão e falou que nunca mais ia fumar e se esforçou muito pra cumprir essa promessa, infelizmente, três anos depois ele morreu de câncer de pulmão. Foi muito triste e realmente me destruiu por dentro. A minha mãe desde então ficou me dizendo: ''Nunca fume. Por favor não deixe sua família passar pela mesma tristeza que seu avô nôs fez passar''. Eu concordei e prometi a mim mesmo nunca fumar. Aos 19 anos, mesmo após muitas tentações, nunca toquei num cigarro. Devo admitir que me arrependo profundamente disso, porque este jogo me deu câncer de qualquer jeito.
Годная игра, только нету продолжения и все идет циклом.

Жуткое выживание или survival horror это про DBD. Есть 4 жертвы и 1 маньяк-убийца. Всех жертв объединяет то, что они пропали без вести и попали на территорию (карту) маньяка, с которой никто не возвращается. Каждая карта окружена стенами и наполнена кучей вещей и вашего страха. Докажите что вы способны на выживание: перехитрите маньяка, заведите все генераторы, подайте питание на ворота, а затем сбегите. В противной случае убийца преподнесёт ваше тело "Сущности" в виде повешения на крюк. За каждую игру вы получаете очки крови, вы можете прокачивать навыки, находить полезные предметы и улутшения к ним. Чем больше вы сбегаете, тем быстрее вы повышаете свой "Престиж". Задача маньяка убить всех, покинуть карту нельзя. Всё просто!
   Игра неплохо затягивает, особенно если выживать с друзьями. Позже выясняются некоторые косяки и проблемы.
Прежде всего познаешь всю прелесть коммьюнити, которая состоит в основном из детей. Тут вам и кемперящие маньяки, которые повесят вас и ждут прямо перед лицом пока вы умрёте. Трусливые тимейты, крысы, которые подставят вас в любом удачном случае. 
   Игра за маньяка требует крепких нервов. Вам подбросит 4 детишек которые мирно общаются в скайпе, и проводят вас до открытых ворот, а после еще и поприседают и скажут что вы нуб. "Спасибо" системе подбора. Если вы их поймаете, ждите очень милые комментарии на вашей стене про вашу маму и к кому она ходила на выходные.
   Несмотря на всё это у игры есть потенциал. Постоянно выходят обновления и новые персонажи с маньяками. Рекомендую на изучение....

Dead by Daylight basiert auf dem modernen 4 vs 1 Prinzip, wobei 4 Spieler mit ihren Charakter versuchen müssen einen geschlossenen Areal zu entkommen ohne dabei vom Gegenspieler erwischt und getötet zu werden. Das Ganze ist dann ansehnlich in Klischeehafte Horror-Film Szenarien verpackt, so dass der Gegner immer ein irrer Mörder oder etwas vergleichbares ist.

Die 4 Spieler, die die Überlebenden spielen können sich im wesentlichen nicht gegen den Bösewicht wehren, ihn lediglich mit einigen wenigen Gegenständen für einige Momente aufhalten. Zeit, die man dringend braucht, wenn man erst einmal entdeckt und verfolgt wird. Bis dahin geht man dem Gegner aber erst mal aus dem Weg, der je nach Typ auch verschiedene Fähigkeiten mit sich bringt. So sind manche Gegner getarnt und nur das ungute Gefühl des pochenden Herzschlags und eine Horror-Melodie lässt seine Gegnerwart vermuten. Dadurch ist man immer hyper aufmerksam im Spiel unterwegs, was es mitunter auch etwas nervenaufreibend macht.

Die Flucht gelingt entweder über die Reaktivierung 5 verschiedener Generatoren, deren Standort dem Gegner aber bekannt ist oder durch eine geheime Falltür. Entkommt man, bekommt man je nachdem wie viel Generatoren man repariert oder wie viel Mitstreitern man geholfen hat usw. sogenannte Blutpunkte, mit dem man als Überlebender neue Fähigkeiten oder Gegenstände frei schalten kann. Das gilt natürlich auch für denjenigen, der den Bösewicht spielt, nur dass bei ihm sein Spiel erfolgreich belohnt wird, wenn er möglichst viele Überlebende zu fassen bekommt.

Entscheidend ist für die Überlebenden in den meisten Fällen die Zusammenarbeit. Gemeinsam repariert man schneller, man kann sich gegenseitig von Verletzungen heilen oder Gefährten vom Fleischerhaken des Gegners befreien, wo er seine Opfer ausbluten lässt. Wer 3 mal am Haken hängt, muss jedoch damit rechnen, dass das Spiel für ihn vorbei ist.
Spielerisch aufgelockert wird das alles durch verschiedene Quick-Time Events, die man bei verschiedenen Aktionen im Spiel durchgeht, die natürlich mitunter sehr fies sein können, wenn man eh schon immer etwas aufgeregt und nervös ist. Während die Überlebenen das in der Thrid-Person Perspektive spielen, hat der Bösewicht den kleinen Nachteil alles aus der Ego-Perspektive erleben zu müssen, so dass er versteckte Überlebende leichter Übersehen kann. Das ist im Normalfall auch sein einziger echter Nachteil.

Grafisch macht das Spiel keine Quantensprünge, aber ist durchaus ansehnlich und atmosphärisch. Sounds und Kulisse sind in der Regel passend dazu umgesetzt.

Zusammengefasst, gerade für kooperative, dunkle Abende zu Hause, eine schöne abendfüllende Unterhaltung.

Durch immer wieder neue DLCs bleibt das Spiel durch neue Killer und Survivor stets interessant.

Some people don't realize how fun it can be to mess with people as a killer.
I hunt and hook everyone, some survive, some do not. Stalk them extensively for no good reason, sneak up and make survivors be stuck in a corner and laugh at them then give them the good ol' smack. Find a survivor in a closet and put a bear trap in front of it so they can't leave. YEET a hatchet at random and hit someone, that feels awesome to do. For no reason decide to defend this one thing and do nothing but stand there defending it. Mid game decide that "You know what, you guys are awesome, I won't kill any of you" and let everyone live, the appreciation feel nice too.

And while most of that doesn't apply in red ranks, there is still a period where it does.

But it's also fun as a survivor to tease the killer or teammates.
And I don't mean T-bag or any other toxic action, I mean coming up to a killer and being like "sup, how's it killin?". Booping the snot. Leaving an offering like a toolbox or a medkit to the killer in hopes he'll spare your puny life. Pulling off a flashlight save and screaming "I GOTCHU BROTHA". Taking the killer on a date and going around the whole map with him, with a cherry on top of face to face action at the end (face camping lul), and I am fine with those, I probably deserved it. Save a teammate off a hook yelling "Get Farmed idiot" as the killer is right behind us. Trap a teammate in a corner. Point at a locket a teammate is hiding in, so he either has to "book or get hooked".

Honestly I love F**king with people.

That review is from 138 hours on record and while it still stands, I wanted to add a bit.

I just want people to know that I don't care, if I have an objective to live, I will leave my three teammates to die, I will do stupid stuff, I will do crazy stuff, I will try my best to make sure everyone lives both as a killer or survivor or sometimes the opposite and make sure you die with me, I don't care what others think, I will play the game the way I want and the way I find fun. If that hurts your little "rule book" you made up for yourself, I just want you to know that I wholeheartedly don't give a single fragment of a crap. 


To anyone who actually reads this wall of texts,
Have a good day and good luck in your endeavors. ♥

Dead By Daylight at its core can best be described as a hide and seek simulator, but with serial killers. Whether you are playing a survivor or one of the killers each side has its own advantages and disadvantages. Like to work as a team? Try playing as a survivor, had a bad day at work and just want to murder people? Be a killer. I honestly didn't think I'd like this game as much as I do because I am by no means a fan of the horror genre but this game is a blast. I suggest you give it a shot and see for yourself.

Хорошая игра, затягивает на долгое время. Надо пытаться проходить проверки реакций, бежать от маньяка, всё это даёт невероятные ощущения. Разработчики часто добавляют что-то новое в игру. Рекомендую поиграть всем.
Здесь вы увидите кемперов, тунелеров и спасателей Малибу. Своеобразная фауна из разный видов игроков. И конечно великолепные комментарии в профиле за то или иное действие.
ребята игра очень хорошая ну хочеться что бы режимов больше добавили
